quotes.quote: Marriage is about the most expensive way for the average man to get laundry done.
Maybe a good rule in life is never become too important to do your own laundry.
Have you noticed that if you leave the laundry in the hamper long enough, it's ready to wear again?
Humanity is the washerwoman of society that wrings out its dirty laundry in tears.
You know it's time to do the laundry when you dry off with a sneaker.
The reality is that we do not wash our own laundry. It just gets dirtier.
The ordinary activities I find most compatible with contemplation are walking, baking bread, and doing laundry.
The price of gold is up 14 fold since last time I tried unfolding it. And laundry has declined two folds.
Oh, let there be nothing on earth but laundry, Nothing but rosy hands in the rising steam And clear dances done in the sight of heaven.
Give me a laundry list and I'll set it to music.
Laundry is the only thing that should be separated by colour.

Now they show you how detergents take out bloodstains, a pretty violent image there. I think if you've got a T-shirt with a bloodstain all over it, maybe laundry isn't your biggest problem.Maybe you should get rid of the body before you do the wash.
Behind every working woman is an enormous pile of unwashed laundry.
Give me a laundry-list and I'll set it to music.
The laundry has its hands on my dirty shirts, sheets, towels and tablecloths, and who knows what tales they tell.

Look after your laundry, and your soul will look after itself.
